EmailTemplate.name: 02-02-23 P&N Atmia FI Email.P&N Atmia FI Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR at ATMIA: Find Out What’s New at Booth 102
EmailTemplate.textOnly: There’s a lot changing in the world of banking. NCR is there to help you succeed. Visit us at booth 102 to learn about the innovative solutions we’re rolling out to financial institutions around the world. Find out how ATM as a Service can unlock your resources while enhancing the customer experience, at your branches, across our retail network and through digital channels. You can experience a cardless NCR Pay360 transaction for yourself. At NCR, we are helping financial institutions achieve the business outcomes they need in today’s market… Transforming the self-directed banking experience, Connecting customers with their money anywhere, anytime and Running the technology and service platform that underpins it all. One more thing – don’t miss Don Layden’s general session on Thursday, February 9 at 10.15 a.m. “Innovating outside the box: ATM strategies lead the charge in the transformation of financial self-service.” See you there!
